document_title: Right-sided migraine: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: dau-nua-dau-ben-phai.json_2_Factors that easily "trigger" a right migraine
subsection_content:
In some cases, right-sided migraines can "visit" faster if they encounter stimulating factors. Accordingly, factors that impact and increase the risk of right-sided migraine include:
Big sound; Bright light; Some smells like perfume, shrimp paste; Change Weather; Anxiety and stress; Smoking or smelling tobacco; Use of alcoholic beverages; All kinds of sweet foods...; ….
subsection_title: dau nua dau ben phai.json. Factors that easily "trigger" a right migraine
